item.description:
Inner Way Weight Loss Group:

A special focus group and class for aligning your mind, body and spirit to allow for a lasting, happy, healthy, satisfied, naturally slender you without deprivation and will power!  Really!


Note: Please do not just use the RSVP meetup feature. Because of the various options, registration must be done directly with Ann, as described below.

Do you want to lose weight and be more healthy and slender?

Does it seem like the only way to do so will mean deprivation and effort, needing will power and discipline, and that it will be hard and unpleasant?  Feel like you don't have what it takes and it won't last?

Have you lost weight, only for it to come back? Ugh!

It doesn’t have to be that way; and it’s certainly not the law of attraction way!

As you’re probably well aware, most weight loss is approached by changing outer behaviors only, changing what and how you eat and getting you to exercise. Motivation is often handled by having you pay, having structure, and having some accountability, or by using will power and discipline.

But, as you may have also discovered, these strategies alone are not typically lasting or easy or pleasurable!

This is because your inner emotional factors involved and the necessary mental strategies are not adequately taken care of. Nor is effective,lasting internal motivation created. When getting and staying slim and healthy means deprivation and endless effort, the weight eventually comes back; and you’re not very happy in the process, either! In the law of attraction world, we call this inner resistance, and a lack of being aligned with and not allowing what you want.

I want to offer you the external structure, support and motivations AND to use my coaching expertise to address your inner needs for an easier way to a lasting, happy, healthy, satisfied, naturally slender you.

In this Inner Way Weight Loss group, you will:

  • create lasting, intrinsic motivation strategies that work
  • resolve any internal “tug-of-war” conflicts that make your weight loss an unnecessary struggle
  • learn and use effective mental strategies to make your weight loss easier
  • learn forgiveness and unconditional love and acceptance of yourself
  • learn how to effectively overcome your triggers and challenges with food, and to change your habits that don’t support what you want
  • change your beliefs that are contributing to being overweight to ones that support you in being naturally and easily healthy, happy, and slender
  • learn and adopt eating strategies of naturally slender people so you can become one, too
  • learn more effective strategies for preventing and dealing with the stress and emotions that can lead to unhealthy habits

And, of course, being who I am, we’ll be adding in some guided meditations and spiritual components, too.

This isn’t about what foods you should and shouldn’t eat or measuring this and that (aren’t you sick of that?). We’ll be using some of the world’s most advanced mind and behavior-changing techniques and you’ll have practical steps in an easy-to-follow program to permanently change how you think about and behave around food from a new, natural, inner way.

When you approach weight loss in this deep and profound way, not only will you easily drop pounds, you’ll also become happier and more fulfilled in general. Inner Way will bring about a powerful transformation that will leave you deeply satisfied on the inside and slim and healthy on the outside.

We're only half way through our current Inner Way program, and participants are already getting great results beyond what they hoped for. And, we're having SO much fun in the process!


"I feel like, for the first time, I am not using willpower and guilt to lose weight; and I am losing weight without feeling deprived...a first for me! Another benefit of this program is that I have begun to change my thinking from "I can't do this" to "anything is possible." And, this new belief applies to more than weight loss.

Basically, I really love everything about this program...the concepts, the exercises that help us practice the tools and the group support. Thank you, Ann!"  Gina J.


Each week, we'll be doing exercises together from a fantastic book, along with some of my own additions, share and support one another and develop close relationships, and we’ll grow and succeed together! You're sure to love it like our current group members do.

"Ann's class is the first weight program I have done (and I've done a lot, including weight watchers) that actually deals with my underlying personal food problems. It's also the most fun, kind and uplifting class I have ever done. Her "feel good" approach to weight loss is a bigger treat than an ice cream! This class has reduced my negative thinking and led me to more fulfilling choices and behaviors. It's a gift that has positively changed all parts of my life, not just eating!" Nancy B.

I promise you that this will do way more than just change your relationship with food and your body. It will change your life.

Included support in the program:

  • Group sessions will be recorded and sent to you in MP3 format, in case you have to miss a session or want to listen again.
  • MP3 recordings of my guided meditations to further support your progress.
  • We’ll have a private on-line group discussion forum for ongoing connection and support.
  • The option of having a learning buddy to connect with as you like.

Now let me ask you some really important questions:

  • If you continue trying the same strategies you've been using unsuccessfully, or do nothing at all, what does that future look like? How does that future feel?
  • How much is your health and well-being, and a slender, healthy body worth to you AND to others in your life? Could you even put a price on it?
  • What are all the possible benefits to be gained if you were successful, in an easy, lasting, natural manner, at having the healthy, slender body you desire?  A  LOT, right?  What else could open up for you?
  • Would all of that be worth at least $129 month?  Are YOU worth that much? (If you don't think so, then you really need to take this program; because you are priceless.)
  • Here are your tuition options: $596 if paid in full, or $129/mo. for 5 months.  (This is life-changing, after all.) I'm open to arranging other payment options, if needed. We'll make it work for you.

Bonus options to further guarantee your success:

  • *** 3 private coaching sessions for only $300 if paid with tuition, which comes to: $896 if paid in full, or $189/mo. for 3 months.

Logistics:

  • When: Tuesday evenings, 7:00 - 8:30pm (please allow for going overtime), April 2nd through June 18th (12 weeks)
  • Where: Dr. Annie Jackman’s Vibrant Life Family Wellness, 33 Main St., Wayland, MA (out back, between Rite Aid and JJ McKays, at the intersections of Routes 27 and 30, with lots of easy parking)

Please share this information with anyone who you think might be interested and would align with this approach!  Doing this with a friend would be super awesome!

I’m limiting the group size to 20 max., so if you’re interested, I encourage you to sign up asap.

Here are the steps to take to register. This is not a week by week meetup. This will be a consistent group of people following the course structure for maximum support and results. Thus, you must commit to participating in the full 12 week program, other than occasional exceptions:

1. E-mail me at annide@newpossibilitiescoaching.com with your name, address, and phone numbers where you can be reached in case of any unforeseen class changes (i.e. stormy weather or illness)

2. Let me know which option you’d like. I’ll send you the appropriate payment instructions. Then make your payment to reserve your spot!

Let’s do this together! To a naturally happy, healthy, slender you!

Warm heart,
Ann
item.how_to_find_us: at intersection of Rt. 27 and 30, in back parking lot, between Rite Aid and JJ McKay's

group.name: "Good Vibrations" Metro West Law of Attraction Community

item.name: Inner Way Weight Loss Group: To align and allow a happy, naturally, slender you
